name: Words Puzzle: Connect
description:
The Most Creative Crossword Puzzle Game ever!

Boost your brain power & keep your mind sharp.

Concentrate to find all hidden words in given letters and connect them.
It starts off as an easy word game and becomes challenging! You will have fun improving your vocabulary and spelling skills. Your brain will thank you for the workout!

HOW TO PLAY?
. Swipe to connect the letters.

TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
. Over 1000+ puzzles are unique and full of fun and amazing challenges!

Notes
. Easy to play game for all ages.
. You can play offline in anytime.
. Enjoy the game with various devices. (Phones and Tablets)
. This game contains the ads like banner, interstitial, and reward video ads.
